name: Coupon overwrite sale price in cart Woocommerce
author: Busila Cristian

sections.description:
The sale price of the product in your cart is being replaced by the regular price if a coupon is applied.

This way, if you give your customers a 50% off coupon, they will get a better deal with the coupon rather
than buying a product that is on sale for let’s say 20% off.

In Woocommerce, by default, if you have a product that is on sale with 20% discount and the user has a 50% off coupon,
the 50% discount will be calculated from the on sale price, which is 20% off.
This plugin is making that the coupon discount is actually calculated from the regular price.

It works for any kind of coupons and any kind of products you have in your Woocommerce store.

Example

See how the plugin works here: http://tempwoo7.rogeek.com/
Add the on sale product in cart, apply the coupon named “50off”.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder “coupon-overwrite-sale-price-in-cart-woocommerce” to the “wp-content/plugins/”
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  3. Do a test in your website store with a product that is on sale, it should work.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the folder “coupon-overwrite-sale-price-in-cart-woocommerce” to the “wp-content/plugins/”
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  3. Do a test in your website store with a product that is on sale, it should work.

Do I need to do anything or change anything besides activating the plugin?

  • No.

Is the plugin going to change the sale prices on my store, besides the cart page?

  • No, the plugin only changes the prices in the cart and further in the checkout page.
    If no coupon is applied, the sale prices stay the same in the cart/checkout page.

What happens when the customer removes the discount coupon?

  • The sale price goes back to normal (in the cart).
